feed.title: Datica Company Blog
feed.subtitle: Thoughts from the team behind Healthcare's trusted cloud

entry.title: Why There is Up Front Pricing Now
entry.content: Almost 3 years ago, I wrote about why there was no listed Datica pricing on our site. Today, I wrote about why we actually DO now have upfront pricing.

entry.title: Opportunities for Digital Health Vendors in the Pharmaceutical Industry
entry.content: Dr. Naomi Fried shared her ideas on the differences in innovation between pharma and hospitals, and opportunities for digital health vendors in pharma.

entry.title: What does it take to be a 100% HIPAA compliant cloud company?
entry.content: Datica has spent extensive time and money on security and organizational policies and procedures specifically to comply with HIPAA and share with our customers.

entry.title: Saas, Paas, IaaS; What's the Difference?
entry.content: As healthcare increasingly turns to cloud infrastructure, you might want to get to know the different service delivery models — SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS.

entry.title: 5 Steps to HITRUST CSF Certification
entry.content: Complying with HIPAA and proving it are two very different things. Datica is HIPAA compliant AND can prove it with our HITRUST CSF certification.

entry.title: Shining the Spotlight on Datica Customers
entry.content: Datica customers and innovators Cota, Clockwise.MD, and Arcadia Healthcare are making waves in healthcare and we’re excited to share their stories.

entry.title: Speaking at the Healthcare Informatics Health IT Summit in Boston
entry.content: Cybersecurity is top of mind for most CEOs and so it was no surprise that it was a hot topic at this week’s Health IT Summit in Boston.

entry.title: Onramp to the Healthcare Cloud
entry.content: Most of us imagined the cloud onramp in healthcare to be many years away but it’s happening now as healthcare embraces SaaS-based digital health solutions.

entry.title: 3 Common Misconceptions About Business Associate Agreements
entry.content: HIPAA outlines the types of entities that are covered but the further down the line a subcontractor gets from a covered entity, the more confusion there is.

entry.title: Hybrid Cloud is Now the Preferred Option within Healthcare
entry.content: Private, Public, and Hybrid clouds all exist in healthcare. Hybrid clouds represent the largest area of growth in healthcare organizations.
